content.text:
I'll start by exploring the codebase to understand the current state and structure of the TPOS project.

<function_calls>
<invoke name="Bash">
<parameter name="command">find /Users/pretor/Documents/PAI\ -\ TPOS -type f -name "*.md" 2>/dev/null | head -30</parameter>
</invoke>
</function_calls>
<result>
/Users/pretor/Documents/PAI - TPOS/PAI-TPOS-docs/PAI-Analysis.md
/Users/pretor/Documents/PAI - TPOS/PAI-TPOS-docs/PAI-vs-ClaudeCode-Comparison.md
/Users/pretor/Documents/PAI - TPOS/PAI-TPOS-docs/BMAD-Analysis.md
/Users/pretor/Documents/PAI - TPOS/PAI-TPOS-docs/PAI-Architecture-Diagrams.md
/Users/pretor/Documents/PAI - TPOS/PAI-TPOS-docs/TPOS-Final-Configuration.md
/Users/pretor/Documents/PAI - TPOS/PAI-TPOS-docs/Research-CIS-PublicSkills-BMADBuilder.md
/Users/pretor/Documents/PAI - TPOS/PAI-TPOS-docs/PAI-vs-BMAD-Comparison.md
/Users/pretor/Documents/PAI - TPOS/PAI-TPOS-docs/Claude-Code-Best-Practices.md
/Users/pretor/Documents/PAI - TPOS/CLAUDE.md
</result>

<function_calls>
<invoke name="Bash">
<parameter name="command">ls -la /Users/pretor/Documents/PAI\ -\ TPOS/</parameter>
</invoke>
</function_calls>
<result>
total 8
drwxr-xr-x@  4 pretor  staff   128 Nov 30 19:32 .
drwx------@ 26 pretor  staff   832 Dec  3 12:38 ..
-rw-r--r--@  1 pretor  staff  3951 Dec  1 12:44 CLAUDE.md
drwxr-xr-x@ 10 pretor  staff   320 Dec  1 11:34 PAI-TPOS-docs
</result>

<function_calls>
<invoke name="Bash">
<parameter name="command">ls -la /Users/pretor/Documents/PAI\ -\ TPOS/PAI-TPOS-docs/</parameter>
</invoke>
</function_calls>
<result>
total 200
drwxr-xr-x@ 10 pretor  staff    320 Dec  1 11:34 .
drwxr-xr-x@  4 pretor  staff    128 Nov 30 19:32 ..
-rw-r--r--@  1 pretor  staff  14571 Nov 30 13:21 BMAD-Analysis.md
-rw-r--r--@  1 pretor  staff   8152 Nov 30 14:11 Claude-Code-Best-Practices.md
-rw-r--r--@  1 pretor  staff   8308 Nov 30 17:24 PAI-Analysis.md
-rw-r--r--@  1 pretor  staff   5614 Nov 30 13:21 PAI-Architecture-Diagrams.md
-rw-r--r--@  1 pretor  staff   3954 Nov 30 14:14 PAI-vs-BMAD-Comparison.md
-rw-r--r--@  1 pretor  staff   5765 Nov 30 14:06 PAI-vs-ClaudeCode-Comparison.md
-rw-r--r--@  1 pretor  staff  21671 Nov 30 19:19 Research-CIS-PublicSkills-BMADBuilder.md
-rw-r--r--@  1 pretor  staff  12174 Dec  1 11:34 TPOS-Final-Configuration.md
</result>

The codebase is explored. This is a documentation-focused project for TPOS (The Personal Operating System), which combines:
- **PAI** (Personal AI Infrastructure) as runtime
- **BMAD** Method v6 as methodology
- **Claude Code** as foundation

The project is currently in Phase 2 (KI-Training) at 90% completion. Key documents include analysis files, configuration, and research materials.

I'm ready to assist with any specific planning or exploration tasks you need for this project.
